bibl.title: The White Monastery Federation Project. Survey and Mapping at the Monastery of Apa Shenoute (Dayr al-Anba Shinūda), Sohag, 2005-2007.
bibl.note: The site. - Objectives. - Surface and subsurface survey and mapping 2005-2007. - Refectories and food preparation areas at the White Monastery. - Conclusions and questions.

Survey and Mapping at the Monastery of Apa Shenoute (Dayr al-Anba Shinūda), Sohag, 2005-2007.
